title: Sierpiński Hexagon
description: A simulation of a Sierpiński Hexagon made by plotting the centroids of equilateral triangles on the sides of a hexagon. The simple, random process creates a beautiful fractal. Made with Konva.js.

title: 3D Orbit Simulation
description: A 3D simulation of the Earth orbiting the Sun. Made with Three.js.

title: 3D Drum Machine
description: A 3D simulation of a drum machine. Made with Three.js.

title: DataComm Laboratory
description: A data communication laboratory on the Web featuring a communication simulator and a spectrometer. Made with React.
